settings.name: Time interval to check for mortality
settings.description: Define the value of the time interval length (unit below) which shall be checked for mortality indications of each track. Make sure that more than one measuement is expected in the time interval. Note that the interval timing can differ by track according to the timestamp of last available measurement.

settings.name: Time unit for interval.
settings.description: Select which time unit to use for the above defined time interval. Note that this unit will be used as divisor unit for the estimated rate of change of voltage.

settings.name: Name of activity count attribute
settings.description: Please insert the name of the activity count attribute in your data. Check the correct spelling in the summary view's track attributes section of the preceding App.

settings.name: Range of circular activity measures
settings.description: Insert the number of different activity measures. Default 256 (for values between 0 and 255)

settings.name: Minimum activity change
settings.description: Insert the minimum change value of activity measure that you require within the below defined time interval. If the activity measure does not change by at least this value, the activity alert will be set to 1.

settings.name: Name of voltage attribute
settings.description: Please insert the name of the tag voltage attribute in your data. Check the correct spelling in the summary view's track attributes section of the preceding App.

settings.name: Minimum voltage threshold
settings.description: Insert the minimum voltage that you consider 'healthy' for your tag/transmitter. If the last measurement of a track/animal has recorded a voltage below this threshold value, the voltage alert will be set to 1.
